scene.name: intro
scene.line: Wait ... I don't remember this test.
Did we cut this one? What's the questionnaire like?
No, this is just ... sometimes, if I can't make it in for a few days, I might leave a note to feed the cats.
For the test subjects? Wow. How do you know they'll do it?
I write it on, um ... university letterhead ...
At least I don't use university property and research equipment to make `weird video art`!
Very well then, I contradict myself.
I wonder which is the nobler transgression ...
I'll settle that question: it's nobler to feed kitties.
Oh, here's another extended monitoring tape, from the waiting room.
